item.title: Infrastructure and Initial Margin
item.description: In 2009 at the G20 summit in Pittsburgh the largest global economies took a long hard look at themselves and asked the question, ‘how do we stop that happening again?’. Of course, they were talking about the global financial crash and the failure of Lehman brothers. Whilst the analysis of what caused the crisis remains debated to this day, what was clear at the time is that OTC derivatives trading practises certainly didn’t help.
